name: Tiradians
overview: Tiradians is a 1-2 player Galaxian clone for the Commodore 64. It was coded nealry entirely in basic David Rees and published as a type-in program in Your Computer 1985/01. It was also published in cassette form in the Spanish version of Your Computer Issue #1. The game is somewhat slower paced than most Galaxian clones, but that's primarily because of the code being nearly completely in BASIC.
